synopsis.text:
Cure Wonderful takes center stage in the enchanting world of Animal Town, a place where harmony between humans and animals is a cherished norm. Iroha Inukai, a second-year junior high school student, finds her life forever changed when her beloved dog, Komugi, transforms into a Pretty Cure to protect her from a mysterious creature named Garugaru.

As Iroha and her newfound Pretty Cure friend navigate the challenges of middle school and the sudden appearance of strange monsters, they discover that their fates are intertwined with a mysterious stone in the heart of Animal Town. This stone grants Komugi the power to assume human form and become Cure Wonderful, but it also hints at a greater threat looming over their cherished town.

Alongside Mayu Nekoyashiki, a newcomer to Animal Town with a deep love for her cat Yuki, Iroha and Cure Wonderful must unravel the mysteries of the stone and protect the animals from the sinister influence of Garugaru. Together, they embark on a journey to restore the animals to the idyllic Niko Garden and safeguard the harmony they hold dear. Prepare for a heartwarming adventure filled with friendship, courage, and the unbreakable bond between humans and animals in Wonderful Precure!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
